title: [BUG] Lottie Animation Not Playing on Second Load
body:
**Description**

I am using the package with a Xamarin Forms app and am using a Lottie animation on the loading page when logging in. The animation works great the first time I log in. But if I log out and log back in, the animation does not appear.

**Code**

Loading Page:

<ContentPage.Content>
        <Grid
			VerticalOptions="Center"
			Padding="10">
            <Grid.RowDefinitions>
                <RowDefinition
					Height="200" />
				<RowDefinition
					Height="*" />
			</Grid.RowDefinitions>
            <Image x:Name="imgLogo"
                WidthRequest="380"
                IsVisible="False"
                HeightRequest="380"
                HorizontalOptions="Center"
                Source="logo.png" />

            <controls:SKLottieView x:Name="lottieView"
                                   AnimationLoaded="LottieView_AnimationLoaded"
                                   Source="brush-loader.json"  
                                   HeightRequest="200"
                                   WidthRequest="200"
                                   HorizontalOptions="Center"
                                   VerticalOptions="Center"
                                   IsAnimationEnabled="True"/>

            <Label
				Grid.Row="2"
				HorizontalTextAlignment="Center"
                FontSize="20"
				Text="{ grial:Translate StringLoading }" />
		</Grid>
	</ContentPage.Content>

**Expected Behavior**

The animation should play every time the page is displayed on the app.

**Actual Behavior**

The animation does not appear on future page loads after the animation has fully played once.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.0.0-preview.61
- Last known good version:  Unsure
- IDE:  Visual Studio 2022
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - Android: 13
  - iOS:  12.0
- Target Devices:   Both iPhone and Android devices
 
</details>
